mapper.select: select b.* from (select rownum as rm, a.* from( select * from notice order by reg_date desc, num desc)a)b where b.rm>=#{startRow} and b.rm<=#{endRow}
mapper.update: update notice set readcount = readcount+1 where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select upload from notice where num=#{num}
select b.subject, b.num from (select rownum as rm, a.* from( select * from notice order by num desc )a)b where b.rm>=#{pre} and b.rm<=#{next} and b.rm!=#{rownum} order by num desc
